content: Yes, in fact, new sports have been added to the program for the upcoming Olympics. Skateboarding, sport climbing, surfing, and karate are being introduced as official sports at the 2020 Summer Olympic Games in Tokyo, Japan. Additionally, baseball/softball, karate, skateboarding, sport climbing, and surfing have been confirmed as official sports at the 2024 Summer Olympics in Paris, France. The addition of these new sports is part of an effort to appeal to younger viewers, broaden the appeal of the Games, and keep the program up to date with the latest trends and interests of the global audience.
